= 11 Ways to Stop Procrastinating for Good (Big Think) =
1. Focus on Long Term Happiness
2. Set Mini Assignments (Like one line at a time; Lower your standards, "Two crappy pages per day")
3. Understand Inspiration vs Motivation (motivation is needed to keep moving; source of inside; your why)
4. Try the Pomodoro Technique
5. Build Procrastination into your schedule (give yourself 5 minutes every hours)
6. Recognize Structured Procrastination
7. Protect Your Time
8. Make Yourself Accountable (incentives and consequences)
9. Keep Distractions Out
10. Reflect on Root Causes
11. Make an Appointment with Yourself
